participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and warm-hearted, Emily enjoys exploring new ideas and connecting with others. She has a playful side that shines through her hobbies.
participant_1.background: I am a healthy weight. I get to be myself when I play with my dogs and make pottery. I've been married for 15 years, but I still trip over my own feet sometimes. i enjoy visiting museums. my hobbies include rock collecting and making macaroni art.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, James takes pleasure in nurturing his garden and creating comics. He has a candid perspective on family and values personal interests.
participant_2.background: I'm not very close to my family, but I love my garden. I am an adult who exercises every day to keep my heart and lungs healthy. I enjoy drawing comics for my grandchildren to enjoy. i hate that i got my brain from the dad i never met. I'm looking for a home that is close to grocery stores so I can take advantage of my couponing skills.

content.text: You too.  What hobbies do you have?
I love to garden, draw comics, and coupon.
Oh, that's cool.  I like to visit museums and make macaroni art.
That's neat!  I've never been to a museum, but I've always wanted to go.
You should definitely check one out!  There's so much to learn and see.
I will!  Thanks for the suggestion.
You're welcome!  What's your favorite type of art to draw?
I like to draw comics for my grandchildren.
That's so cute!  I bet they love them.
They do!  They're always asking me to draw them more.
That's awesome.  I'm glad you have such a fun hobby.
Thanks!  What's your favorite type of macaroni art?
I like to make pictures of animals.
That's cute!  I've never tried making macaroni art before.
You should!  It's really easy and fun.
Maybe I will!  Thanks for the suggestion.
